# .github

GitHub Actions workflows for CI/CD.

## Linting

**Always** run `make lint` after any workflow change to catch issues early.

<!-- BEGIN FILE INDEX -->
## File Index

Autogenerated file index based on first-line comments.

- `workflows/android.yml`: CI workflow for Android builds, lint, and tests.
- `workflows/ci.yml`: CI workflow for pushes to main.
- `workflows/pr.yml`: CI workflow for pull requests on all branches except gh-pages.
<!-- END FILE INDEX -->
